title: OffsetDateTime read different from DB.
body:
### Describe the bug

we have on column in postgresql db called **createdOn** => 2021-10-17 19:31:29.626829-04
while we are reading data from DB values is different like adding "T"  => 2021-10-17T19:31:29.626829

not sure how to solve this issue? or add any entry in the application?

Our end planning is to return values in API response.

### Expected behavior

have to read same value as like in DB 

### Actual behavior

values are differ compare to DB.

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

_No response_
